  • Method Details

    • depositsTest

      @Test public void depositsTest()
      Deposits test. We are testing if the methods regarding the deposits (get, set, swap) work. We try to cover each possible scenario for the swapDeposits method (action ok, action ko for too much resources, action ko for leader deposits problems).

    • developTest

      @Test public void developTest()
      Develop test. We are testing if the methods regarding the DevelopCard slots (getSlot, getTopCard, addCard) work.
